Direction of Present NLC Positron Effort

Decision to put development of NLC conventional e+ source on hold so as to investigate the feasibility of a polarized positron source for the NLC
Decision to put development of NLC
conventional e+ source on hold so as to
investigate the feasibility of a
polarized positron source for the NLC
